H0.text: Earth revolves around the sun once per day is a phenomenon that occurs in our solar system.

H1.text: The moon revolves around Earth once per day in our solar system.

H2.text: Earth revolves around the sun once per year is a phenomenon that happens in our solar system.

H3.text: The moon revolves around Earth once per year in our solar system.

A4.text: During which time Earth has traveled 940 million km (584 million mi).

A5.text: One complete orbit takes 365.256 days (1 sidereal year).
